name: EverTutor Live
tagline: Your very own AI Tutor that teaches, adapts, and interacts
description: EverTutor is your AI-powered voice tutor, personalized to your learning style. Engage with it like an interactive Zoom call to master complex topics like GRE prep. Receive instant feedback as your AI tutor tailors lessons to your pace and needs.

name: Amurex
tagline: AI companion to organize, retrieve and act on your workflows
description: Amurex is an open-source AI that integrates in your workflow, connecting and organizing knowledge across your existing tooling. Search, organise, and retrieve insights effortlessly, without switching contexts. Fully self-hostable for complete data control.

name: Llama 4
tagline: A new era of natively multimodal AI innovation
description: The Llama 4 collection of models are natively multimodal AI models that enable text and multimodal experiences. These models leverage a mixture-of-experts architecture to offer industry-leading performance in text and image understanding.

name: Refgrow
tagline: Add an affiliate program to your SaaS in minutes
description: Turn your users into affiliates — right inside your SaaS. Refgrow lets you embed a native affiliate dashboard into your product in minutes. No external tools. No earnings limits. From just $9/mo.

name: The New Microsoft Copilot
tagline: Your AI Companion
description: Meet the new Microsoft Copilot, your AI companion that remembers details (Memory), takes action (Actions), sees your world (Vision), and more. More personal & useful.

name: Dayo
tagline: Get paid NOT to use social media
description: Dayo is a free app that pays you to use less social media. Keep your daily use under 30 minutes and get $5 bucks a day. The money can be used in Dayo’s marketplace of goods and services.

name: blakebill
tagline: Send your files. No payment, no download.
description: blakebill lets you set your price, share your work, and get paid—perfect for freelance videographers, coders, designers, music producers, pretty much any creative professional.

name: Mergify
tagline: Merge Spotify playlists.
description: Effortlessly merge Spotify playlists, detect and remove duplicates, and sync updates automatically. Combine your playlists with others or Spotify-generated ones to create the ultimate mix. Keep your music clean, organized, and always up-to-date!

name: Synchora
tagline: Timezone tracker to visualize how your hours shift
description: Synchora is an app that helps you keep track of time zones around the globe. With simple yet engaging features, Synchora lets you quickly compare time differences and visualize how hours shift throughout the day.

name: Sweep AI
tagline: AI coding assistant in IntelliJ, PyCharm, and JetBrains IDEs
description: Sweep is an AI coding assistant purpose-built for JetBrains IDEs. We bring features like multi-file code "apply" and automatic context awareness into a secure, on-prem ready AI plugin for JetBrains.

name: Update
tagline: ⚡️ Authentication & Billing Made Easy
description: Build powerful apps with seamless user authentication, organization management, and built-in subscription billing.

name: Klack
tagline: Satisfying sound with every keystroke
description: A blazing fast native menubar app for Mac with high-fidelity sound, immersive spatial audio, instant type feedback, customizable switches, up/down keystrokes, and randomized pitching—designed to make every keystroke feel alive.

name: HTTL Project
tagline: HTTL + GitHub Copilot = Instant OpenAPI Specs
description: HTTL Project, powered by GitHub Copilot’s agentic capabilities, analyzes your codebase, generates OpenAPI specs, and builds realistic payloads - all inside VS Code, no context switching needed.

name: ResumeInvent
tagline: Get Noticed, Get Hired – The ATS Way!
description: Tired of wasting time tweaking your resume? Meet ResumeInvent – the internet's first ATS resume builder that gives you a 100% ATS-optimized resume. No more suggestions or content to adjust, just a complete, job-winning resume ready to land you your dream job!

name: Redstone AI – Ship What Customers Want
tagline: Test customer demand via AI sims, then ship.
description: Redstone AI helps you ship exactly what customers want—10x faster. Validate ideas risk-free with AI-powered Review Analysis and AI Personas. Spot trends, prioritize features, and build with confidence. Try for free—no credit card needed

name: VidifyAI Studio
tagline: Create stunning AI videos from text in minutes.
description: Create studio-quality videos featuring lifelike AI avatars in minutes, not hours. The smarter way to produce engaging content for marketing, education, and business.

name: CosmoQuick
tagline: Hire A Pre-Vetted Candidate in 60 minutes
description: Hiring is often slow, inefficient, and frustrating. Sorting through endless resumes, scheduling interviews, and dealing with unqualified applicants wastes valuable time. What if you could hire in just 60 minutes? CosmoQuick Does Just THAT!

name: GrowthRoles
tagline: Job board exclusively for growth and digital marketers.
description: Find thousands of growth and digital marketing jobs pulled directly from company career pages. Skip the competition, apply smarter, and land your next marketing role faster. Get instant access to fresh jobs updated every hour before they go mainstream.

name: Gromaply
tagline: Power tool for creating project architectures and roadmaps
description: Gromaply is a powerful tool for designing project architectures and roadmaps. It provides an intuitive and flexible editor for structuring complex systems, planning development phases, and visualizing project workflows.

name: Yank
tagline: Build flashcards at the speed of light
description: Revolutionize Learning: AI-Powered Flashcard Platform with Spaced Repetition
